Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: All these behavioral parameters showed statistically significant changes suggesting that regular physical exercises decrease susceptibility to subsequently induced seizures and ameliorate the course of experimentally induced status epilepticus .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| seizures |
| status epilepticus |

The two disease entities identified in the paragraph are "seizures" and "status epilepticus". These terms are used to describe abnormal electrical activity in the brain that can lead to a variety of symptoms, including convulsions, loss of consciousness, and altered behavior.

The two disease entities identified in the paragraph are "seizures" and "status epilepticus". The term "experimentally induced status epilepticus" refers to a laboratory procedure used to study the disease, rather than the disease itself, so it is not included as a separate entity. The term "subsequently induced seizures" also refers to the disease, so it is included as a synonym for "seizures". The term "behavioral parameters" does not clearly refer to a disease, so it is not included as an entity.
